requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS , Ubuntu 16.04+ or comparable
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/8/7/Vista
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: graphic card support directx 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 5600
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
